sn46.32:1.1: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, dhamma kusala kusalabhagiya kusalapakkhika, sabbe te yonisomanasikaramulaka yonisomanasikarasamosarana; yonisomanasikaro tesam dhammanam aggamakkhayati.
sn46.32:1.2: Yonisomanasikarasampannassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno patikankham—satta bojjhange bhavessati, satta bojjhange bahulikarissati.
sn46.32:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yonisomanasikarasampanno satta bojjhange bhaveti, satta bojjhange bahulikaroti?
sn46.32:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe…
sn46.32:2.3: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.32:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yonisomanasikarasampanno satta bojjhange bhaveti, satta bojjhange bahulikaroti”ti.
